item.title: Sections and outlines in HTML5
item.description: Mozilla provides by far the best HTML5 introduction guide available on the net. Here I will outline tl;dr and provide example of «The Holy Grail» layout. Address The address element represents the contact information for its nearest article or body element ancestor. Article “The article element represents a complete, or self-contained, composition in a document, page, application, or site and that is, in principle, independently distributable or reusable, e.g. in syndication.
